name: International Conference on Business and Social Science
content: International Conference on Business and Social Science (ICBASS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers, and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Social Science. 2019 ICBASS will take place from March 26-28, 2019 in Kyoto, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. More information please visit http://icbass.org Topics are listed but are not restricted to the followings: Communication Economics Education Culture Finance Law Management Politics Psychology Social Studies
